snippet: The Mexican telecommunications giant owned by the billionaire Carlos Slim Helú is offering $3.4 billion to raise its stake in KPN, the Dutch wireless phone and Internet service provider, as it expands outside its core markets.
abstract: The Mexican telecommunications giant owned by the billionaire Carlos Slim Helú is offering $3.4 billion to raise its stake in KPN, the Dutch wireless phone and Internet service provider, as it expands outside its core markets.

headline.main: America Movil Looks to Raise Stake in KPN
